snippet: A bomb exploded in a subway station in Santiago, the capital, on Monday, wounding at least 14 people.
abstract: Bomb explodes in subway station in Santiago, Chile, wounding at least 14 people; no one has claimed responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: A bomb exploded in a subway station in Santiago, the capital, on Monday, wounding at least 14 people.

headline.main: Chile: Bombing in Santiago Wounds at Least 14 People
headline.print_headline: Chile: Bombing in Santiago Wounds at Least 14 People
